name: Light Helmet
description: � A simple leather cap offering basic head protection. Perfect for those just starting their journey. ?

name: Light Chestplate
description: � A lightweight leather vest that protects your vital organs without restricting movement. ?

name: Light Leggings
description: � Simple leather pants that offer basic leg protection. Light and comfortable for long adventures. ?

name: Medium Helmet
description: � A reinforced iron helm offering balanced protection. The standard choice for mid-level adventurers. ?

name: Medium Chestplate
description: ?? A sturdy chainmail vest reinforced with iron plates. Provides solid torso protection without sacrificing mobility. ?

name: Medium Leggings
description: � Reinforced leg guards with chainmail lining. Offers improved protection while maintaining decent mobility. ?

name: Samurai Helmet
description: � A traditional kabuto helmet worn by ancient warriors. Its menacing face guard strikes fear into enemies. ?

name: Samurai Chestplate
description: � A magnificent do (chest armor) crafted in the traditional samurai style. Layered plates provide excellent protection. ?

name: Samurai Leggings
description: � Traditional suneate (shin guards) and haidate (thigh guards) worn by samurai warriors. Offers excellent leg protection. ?

name: Knight Helmet
description: � A full steel great helm worn by noble knights. Provides exceptional head protection in battle. ?

name: Knight Chestplate
description: � A magnificent suit of plate armor worn by the realm's finest knights. Forged from the strongest steel. ?

name: Knight Leggings
description: � Heavy plate greaves and cuisses protecting the legs. Essential armor for any knight entering battle. ?

name: Dark Knight Helmet
description: � A menacing helm forged from dark steel and shadow essence. The ultimate head protection for those who embrace darkness. ?

name: Dark Knight Chestplate
description: � A legendary suit of dark plate armor infused with shadow magic. The ultimate torso protection for the most powerful warriors. ?

name: Dark Knight Leggings
description: � Dark greaves forged from shadow steel. The ultimate leg protection for warriors who have mastered the darkness. ?
